title: VanLife Mega Roundup: Custom camper vans, trailers & overland gear from Sea Otter
content:
This year’s Sea Otter Classic had more custom camper van builders, overland suppliers, and offroad-capable trailer campers than ever. And they were rad! From remote lift suspensions to outback-ready rooftop tents, and lifted Sprinters to modular Ford Transits, this mega roundup has something for (almost) every budget and lifestyle… VanDOit’s modular interiors add options VanDOit

The post VanLife Mega Roundup: Custom camper vans, trailers & overland gear from Sea Otter appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
